boat.fogm package

Submodules

boat.fogm.mesm module

class boat.fogm.mesm.MESM(ll_objective: Callable, lower_loop: int, ul_model: Module, ul_objective: Callable, ll_model: Module, ll_opt: Optimizer, ll_var: List, ul_var: List, solver_config: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: DynamicalSystem

Implements the optimization procedure of Moreau Envelop based Single-loop Method (MESM).

:param : :type : param ll_objective: The lower-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_objective: callable :param : :type : param ul_objective: The upper-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_objective: callable :param : :type : param ll_model: The lower-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ul_model: The upper-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ll_var: The list of lower-level variables of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_var: List :param : :type : param ul_var: The list of upper-level variables of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_var: List :param : :type : param lower_loop: Number of iterations for lower-level optimization. :param : :type : type lower_loop: int :param : :type : param solver_config: Dictionary containing solver configurations. :param : :type : type solver_config: dict

References

[1] Liu R, Liu Z, Yao W, et al. Moreau Envelope for Nonconvex Bi-Level Optimization: A Single-loop and Hessian-free Solution Strategy[J]. ICML, 2024.

optimize(ll_feed_dict: Dict, ul_feed_dict: Dict, current_iter: int)[source]

Execute the optimization procedure with the data from feed_dict.

Parameters:

  • ll_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the lower-level data used for optimization. It typically includes training data, targets, and other information required to compute the LL objective.

  • ul_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the upper-level data used for optimization. It typically includes validation data, targets, and other information required to compute the UL objective.

  • current_iter (int) – The current iteration number of the optimization process.

Returns:

None

boat.fogm.pgdm module

class boat.fogm.pgdm.PGDM(ll_objective: Callable, lower_loop: int, ul_model: Module, ul_objective: Callable, ll_model: Module, ll_opt: Optimizer, ll_var: List, ul_var: List, solver_config: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: DynamicalSystem

Implements the optimization procedure of Penalty based Gradient Descent Method (PGDM) [1].

:param : :type : param ll_objective: The lower-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_objective: callable :param : :type : param ul_objective: The upper-level objective of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_objective: callable :param : :type : param ll_model: The lower-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ul_model: The upper-level model of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_model: torch.nn.Module :param : :type : param ll_var: The list of lower-level variables of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ll_var: List :param : :type : param ul_var: The list of upper-level variables of the BLO problem. :param : :type : type ul_var: List :param : :type : param lower_loop: Number of iterations for lower-level optimization. :param : :type : type lower_loop: int :param : :type : param solver_config: Dictionary containing solver configurations. :param : :type : type solver_config: dict

References

[1] Shen H, Chen T. On penalty-based bilevel gradient descent method[C]. In ICML, 2023.

Execute the optimization procedure with the data from feed_dict.

  • ul_feed_dict (Dict) – Dictionary containing the upper-level data used for optimization. It typically includes validation data, targets, and other information required to compute the UL objective.

boat.fogm.vfm module

class boat.fogm.vfm.VFM(ll_objective: Callable, lower_loop: int, ul_model: Module, ul_objective: Callable, ll_model: Module, ll_opt: Optimizer, ll_var: List, ul_var: List, solver_config: Dict[str, Any])[source]

Bases: DynamicalSystem

Implements the optimization procedure of Value-function based First-Order Method (VFM) [1].

References

[1] R. Liu, X. Liu, X. Yuan, S. Zeng and J. Zhang, “A Value-Function-based Interior-point Method for Non-convex Bi-level Optimization”, in ICML, 2021.
